posts.title: Love at First Sip Duo, now in the app
posts.text: Join Starbucks® Rewards and say “be mine” to the Chocolate-Covered Strawberry Crème Frappuccino® drink or Chocolate Hazelnut Cookie Cold Brew, perfect for sharing. Here for a limited time.

posts.title: Next-level luxurious
posts.text: Velvety smooth, deliciously lush. Try the new Oleato Golden Foam™ Iced Shaken Espresso with Toffeenut and the Oleato™ Caffè Latte with Oatmilk.

posts.title: Happy Lunar New Year
posts.text: It’s the dragon’s time to shine with this Starbucks eGift, the perfect way to wish someone a happy 2024.

posts.title: Bold and bright
posts.text: Celebrate the Year of the Dragon with the fruity, lively Dragon Drink™.

posts.title: Icy and cozy and creamy—oh my
posts.text: All is well when you’re sipping a Pistachio Cream Cold Brew with a salted brown-buttery topping.

posts.title: Do your day right
posts.text: Grab a savory Bacon, Sausage & Egg Wrap, our Chicken, Maple Butter & Egg Sandwich or the Impossible™ Breakfast Sandwich*.

posts.title: “A smile makes a big difference.”
posts.text: - Brenda, Starbucks Partner (Employee), Our partners uplift each other and their communities every day.
